abstract: Modifies this view by binding its focus state to the given state value.

declaration.code: nonisolated func focused<Value>(_ binding: FocusState<Value>.Binding, equals value: Value) -> some View where Value : Hashable

overview:
## Return Value

The modified view.

## Discussion

Use this modifier to cause the view to receive focus whenever the `binding` equals the `value`. Typically, you create an enumeration of fields that may receive focus, bind an instance of this enumeration, and assign its cases to focusable views.

The following example uses the cases of a `LoginForm` enumeration to bind the focus state of two [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/TextField] views. A sign-in button validates the fields and sets the bound `focusedField` value to any field that requires the user to correct a problem.

To control focus using a Boolean, use the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/View/focused(_:)] method instead.

items.description: Modifies this view by binding its focus state to the given Boolean state value.
items.name: focused(_:)

items.description: Returns whether the nearest focusable ancestor has focus.
items.name: isFocused

items.description: A property wrapper type that can read and write a value that SwiftUI updates as the placement of focus within the scene changes.
items.name: FocusState

items.description: A property wrapper for observing values from the focused view or one of its ancestors.
items.name: FocusedValue

items.description: Creates an environment values, transaction, container values, or focused values entry.
items.name: Entry()

items.description: A protocol for identifier types used when publishing and observing focused values.
items.name: FocusedValueKey

items.description: A convenience property wrapper for observing and automatically unwrapping state bindings from the focused view or one of its ancestors.
items.name: FocusedBinding

items.description: Modifies this view by binding the focus state of the search field associated with the nearest searchable modifier to the given Boolean value.
items.name: searchFocused(_:)

items.description: Modifies this view by binding the focus state of the search field associated with the nearest searchable modifier to the given value.
items.name: searchFocused(_:equals:)

title: focused(_:equals:)
